Name: Battle Arts - Boss Rush
Desc: Increases Boss Monster Damage for Ark's 1st to 4th Attack skills (except Spell Missile, Approaching Death, Returning Hatred, and Endless Torment) and 6th Mastery Core skills.

Desc.Old: Increases Damage on Boss monster when used Arc's 1st~4th Attack Skills excluding Spell Missile, Approaching Death, and Returning Hatred, and 6th Mastery Core Skills.
Desc.New: Increases Boss Monster Damage for Ark's 1st to 4th Attack skills (except Spell Missile, Approaching Death, Returning Hatred, and Endless Torment) and 6th Mastery Core skills.
